attributes.action: sack Metropolitan Police Commisioner Ian Blair and do not allow 50-90 day detention Act to pass as law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We agree that Blair should take responsibility for the 2005 Stockwell shooting of an innocent man by leaving the force and being permanently barred from working in any home office agency. Also detention of terror suspects should not increase.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
